reference.title: choption
reference.shortdesc: The <choption> element describes an option that a user could choose to accomplish a step of a task. In a user interface, for example, this might be the name of radio button.

example.title: Example
example.pre: <step><cmd>Then this</cmd> <choicetable> <chhead> <choptionhd>Do something</choptionhd> <chdeschd>And this happens</chdeschd> </chhead> <chrow><choption>Do this</choption> <chdesc>and this will happen</chdesc></chrow> <chrow><choption>Do that</choption> <chdesc>and that will happen</chdesc></chrow> </choicetable> </step>
